tool.name: Normalisation
tool.help:
This tool normalizes NMR spectra before further processing. It is meant to correct for dilution effects in the intensity of the spectra and make them more comparable.
**Normalisation methods**
**PQN** (probabilistic quotient normalisation) as described in Dieterle *et al.*
**Total integral** normalises the spectra by its total integral under the curve.
**Reference peak** normalises the spectra by a user specified reference peak. Enter a ppm interval in the **Peak position** box.
